item.title: Frames EPISODE 3 - Megaclaw [EP]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
You’ve got a solid set of tunes there. Some great grooves.

Some of them are quite short, making them feel a bit like partially developed ideas.
But, all of them have a solid groove idea at the centre.

I also think that sound selection and design was a bit underwhelming, giving them a kind of ‘Auxy syndrome’, where they share the same sound palette as so many other Auxy tracks.

You kinda get away with it on some tracks, e.g. on basses, where the more generic synth sounds actually work well. But, as soon as a Auxy signature sound pops up, it kinda kills it a little bit for me.

Still, as said, a solid set of grooves. Maybe tracks that can developed a bit further.

Read full topic

Some guidance on how best to title new track posts…

How to post your tracks Post Your Tracks
To ensure your Auxy tracks are visible and easy to browse, here’s some guidelines for posting your Auxy tracks. How to Post Your Auxy Tracks Post your completed track in the TRACKS category OR, click here One thread per track, EP or album. Post your work In progress tracks in the WIP category OR, click here One thread per track, EP or album. Threads should be named: [Track_Name] - [Artist] eg: Sonic Passion - StinkFace Tracks without a name can be called: “Untitled - By…
